name: CONFLICT RESOLUTION (lamedeveloper)
description:
A quirky RPG where you combine letters into words to battle, while trying to save a space ship from a dangerous virus!

Quickly made by @westthewerst, @zucchinifuzz, @aboxartist, @skuise, and @applescruffart!

Very very VERY VERY buggy! And kinda unfinished! And as Jams go, vaguely missing out on a lot of things we wanted! Hope you enjoy our silly little game.

May update and make actually good? maybe? We'll see.
